summary: A command‑line utility that reads Kaldi data files (such as wav.scp, text, utt2spk) and transforms the extracted metadata into a JSON manifest suitable for NeMo speech‑recognition training pipelines.
business_intent: Simplify the preparation of speech‑recognition datasets by converting existing Kaldi‑formatted corpora into a standardized JSON format that can be directly consumed by downstream ASR model training workflows.
